# SunMedia

## Example

```html
<amp-ad
  width="1"
  height="1"
  type="sunmedia"
  layout="responsive"
  data-cid="5898aec7-32f5-4e3b-bd67-41f68b58b412"
  data-block-on-consent="_till_responded"
></amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For further information, please contact [SunMedia](http://sunmedia.tv/#contact).

### Required parameters

-   `data-cid`: Integration ID provided by SunMedia
